title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 356.5 - Partial rollovers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 356.5 - Partial rollovers

State Regulations
A distributee may not elect to have a direct rollover of only
a portion of an eligible rollover distribution unless the portion to be rolled
over is equal to or greater than $500. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
356.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
